channel.title: Careers on DataBased
channel.description: Recent content in Careers on DataBased

item.title: Looking Back: A Bi-Annual Review
item.description: The Past 6 Months Remembering the Highs Amid the Lows What’s next? Open Your Purse 👛 The Past 6 Months Right before I started this year, I counted down to midnight like everyone does every year with a heart full of hope for meaningful change and countless new memories with friends and family. And shortly after, I got my wish. ⭐

item.title: Reflecting on the STEM AP “Ask Me Anything” Event 🎉
item.description: Looking Back The Response What’s Next? Looking Back It has been nearly three weeks since the STEM AP “Ask Me Anything” Event. Nevertheless, I can’t stop thinking about what happened. First of all, it was a great success. After the last words were said and contact information was exchanged, I left the event filling full. No, it wasn’t the pizza. I was full of happiness. Positivity. Fulfillment.

item.title: Galvanizing Interest in Computing
item.description: My Last Undergrad Semester The UMass STEM Ambassadors Program The ECEP Alliance The UMass STEM Ambassadors “Ask Me Anything” Event Surveying STEM AP What’s Next? My Last Undergrad Semester The start of my final semester as an undergraduate student is well on its way! It is already a whirlwind of new experiences. As I wrap up my degree, I have had the pleasure of meeting awesome new peers—both on and off campus—and multiple professors in interesting classes.
